text: Standing at the lookout points, I was mesmerized by the panoramic views of the coast and dotted with ships.
You can see Singapore offshore islands from here. You can see Pulau Bukom - an island doing oil refineries for Singapore. You can see Pasir Panjang port too

A lookout that is not obvious unless you come up close, as there is no sign or whatever so. Beautiful view from the tall position. Nparks should revamp the area abit to make this place more attractive. Great spot to visit if you are in the vicinity.
Great view over the harbour and the bay full of container ships
Pity that a great view of the ships lying off the coast is partially blocked by the trees.
